overview:
SMS Josh - Send Unlimited Free SMS in India, Bulk SMS Provider

www.smsjosh.com is an online and mobile based social networking site for connecting people . It allows members to transfer their ideas and funny messages through sms.

It is a place where you can Invite, Connect, Share, Send and fun messages. The platform is designed to provide you with unlimited freedom of expression.
